name: T.H.O.R.
note: This card constrains the order in which you can use its effects. (Most cards don't.) Also note that each target must be a different player.

baseEffect.name: Basic effect
baseEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.

firstExtraEffect.name: Chain reaction
firstExtraEffect.description: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see.

secondExtraEffect.name: High voltage
secondExtraEffect.description: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction.
